languages.text: "Брат Тикон... Я встречал его, еще когда он звался Тиконом Драйвстемом и был не монахом, а внуком и наследником Урбенда, губернатора Даргонуса. Достойный юноша с огоньком в глазах. Его возвышение многое значило бы для Драйвстемов".

"Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."
languages.original_text: "Брат Тикон... Я встречал его, еще когда он звался Тиконом Драйвстемом и был не монахом, а внуком и наследником Урбенда, губернатора Даргонуса. Достойный юноша с огоньком в глазах. Его возвышение многое значило бы для Драйвстемов".

languages.text: «El hermano Tychon... Nos conocimos cuando se llamaba Tychon Drivestem. En aquel entonces no era monje. Era el nieto y heredero de Urbend, el gobernador de Dargonus. Un joven honorable con fuego en los ojos. Su ascenso significaría mucho para los Drivestem».
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."

traits.locale_text: «El hermano Tychon... Nos conocimos cuando se llamaba Tychon Drivestem. En aquel entonces no era monje. Era el nieto y heredero de Urbend, el gobernador de Dargonus. Un joven honorable con fuego en los ojos. Su ascenso significaría mucho para los Drivestem».

languages.text: « Frère Tychon... Nos chemins se sont croisés du temps où il s'appelait encore Tychon Drivestem, avant qu'il ne devienne moine. C'est le petit-fils et l'héritier d'Urbend, le gouverneur de Dargonus, un jeune homme honorable avec une étincelle au fond des yeux. Son accession au poste de prélat ravirait les Drivestem. »
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."

traits.locale_text: « Frère Tychon... Nos chemins se sont croisés du temps où il s'appelait encore Tychon Drivestem, avant qu’il ne devienne moine. C’est le petit-fils et l'héritier d'Urbend, le gouverneur de Dargonus, un jeune homme honorable avec une étincelle au fond des yeux. Son accession au poste de prélat ravirait les Drivestem. »

languages.text: “第谷兄弟……我们曾有过一面之缘。那时他还不是僧侣，而是达戈努斯总督厄本的孙子与继承人，全名叫作第谷·德莱夫斯塔。我记得，他的眼睛炯炯有神，是位可亲可敬的年轻人。如果他能升职，这会对德莱夫斯塔家族有很重要的意义。”
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."

traits.locale_text: “第谷兄弟……我们曾有过一面之缘。那时他还不是僧侣，而是达戈努斯总督厄本的孙子与继承人，全名叫作第谷·德莱夫斯塔。我记得，他的眼睛炯炯有神，是位可亲可敬的年轻人。如果他能升职，这会对德莱夫斯塔家族有很重要的意义。”

languages.text: 「ブラザー・ティコン…彼と私は、彼がティコン・ドライブステムと呼ばれていた頃に会ったことがあります。当時は修道士ではなく、ダルゴナス総督アーベンドの孫であり後継者でした。瞳に輝きを放つ立派な若者だった。彼の昇華は、ドライブステム家にとって大きな意味を持つでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラザー・ティコン…彼と私は、彼がティコン・ドライブステムと呼ばれていた頃に会ったことがあります。当時は修道士ではなく、ダルゴナス総督アーベンドの孫であり後継者でした。瞳に輝きを放つ立派な若者だった。彼の昇華は、ドライブステム家にとって大きな意味を持つでしょう」

languages.text: "Bruder Tychon ... Er und ich sind uns einmal begegnet, als er noch Tychon Drivestem hieß. Er war damals noch kein Mönch, sondern nur der Enkel und Erbe von Urbend, dem Gouverneur von Dargonus. Ein ehrenwerter junger Mann mit einem Funkeln in den Augen. Sein Aufstieg würde den Drivestems viel bedeuten."
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."

traits.locale_text: "Bruder Tychon ... Er und ich sind uns einmal begegnet, als er noch Tychon Drivestem hieß. Er war damals noch kein Mönch, sondern nur der Enkel und Erbe von Urbend, dem Gouverneur von Dargonus. Ein ehrenwerter junger Mann mit einem Funkeln in den Augen. Sein Aufstieg würde den Drivestems viel bedeuten."

languages.text: "Rahip Tychon... Thycon Drivestem adıyla anıldığı vakitlerde kendisiyle tanışmıştım. O zamanlar bir keşiş değildi, Dargonus Valisi Urbend'in torunu ve vârisiydi. Gözleri parıldayan, onurlu bir delikanlı. Bu konuma yükselmesi, Drivestem ailesi için çok büyük önem taşıyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Brother Tychon... He and I have met, back when he was called Tychon Drivestem. He wasn't a monk back then, he was a grandson and heir to Urbend, Governor of Dargonus. An honourable young man with a spark in his eyes. His ascension would mean much to the Drivestems."
